alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 11:24AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson County through NOON CDT... At 1124 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Cottondale, or 7 miles east of Pine Bluff, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Altheimer... Madding... Cottondale... Glenlake... Rob Roy... LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
